capabilities.description: Act as an instructional designer. Using {{subject}}, {{difficulty}}, and {{multimedia_manifest}}, output a full HTML/JSON pack with sections, objectives, CTA copy, and audio/video transcript references.
Generate content for a single chapter in a skeleton-first book pipeline (no image generation). Return JSON {"bookId": string, "bookVersionId": string, "chapterIndex": number}.
Generate a full book using a skeleton-first pipeline (no image generation). Return JSON {"bookId": string, "bookVersionId": string, "chapterCount": number}.
Generate a glossary / begrippenlijst for a canonical book version. Return JSON {"bookId": string, "bookVersionId": string}.
Generate an index term list for a canonical book version (no page numbers yet). Return JSON {"bookId": string, "bookVersionId": string}.
Generate content for a single section in a skeleton-first book pipeline (internal). Return JSON {"bookId": string, "bookVersionId": string, "chapterIndex": number, "sectionIndex": number}.
Create a versioned canonical book record from uploaded inputs. Return JSON {"book_version_id": string, "canonical_path": string}.
Rewrite the generated book content to match the N3 (student-friendly) voice while preserving structure and correctness. Return JSON {"bookId": string, "bookVersionId": string}.
Enqueue a chapter render job for a canonical book version. Return JSON {"run_id": string, "chapter_index": number}.
Enqueue a full book render job for a canonical book version. Return JSON {"run_id": string}.
Compile supplied mockup HTML into React routes. Ensure every data-cta-id is preserved. Return JSON {"success": boolean, "files_generated": string[], "errors": string[]}.

Generate an Arabic (RTL) variant of a pre-rendered curated material pack. Arabic output must include Dutch keywords in blue parentheses for terminology learning. Return JSON {"ok": boolean, "curated_material_id": string, "language_variant": "ar"}.

You are an adaptive learning coach. Given {{title}}, {{subject}}, {{learner_id}}, and recent session context, propose the next best set of activities. Return JSON {"summary": string, "suggested_actions": string[], "updated_fields": {"ai_variant_id": string, "status": string}}.
Generate a grounded lesson plan for the teacher request in payload.queryText. Return JSON {"ok": boolean, "answer": string, "lessonPlan": json, "recommendations": json[]}.
Generate a multi-week lesson plan based on payload.queryText. Return JSON {"ok": boolean, "answer": string, "multiWeekPlan": json, "recommendations": json[]}.
Review the provided course blueprint for missing CTAs, accessibility violations, and policy blockers. Respond with JSON {"summary": string, "violations": string[], "status": "passed"|"failed"}.
Build a grounded lesson kit from the provided material/course context. Return JSON {"lesson_kit": json, "status": "ready"|"failed", "notes": string}.
Analyze the ingested material and produce a teacher-facing summary plus recommended next actions. Return JSON {"summary": string, "key_concepts": string[], "suggested_assignments": string[]}.
Ingest the uploaded material at {{storage_path}} into chunks and embeddings. Return JSON {"material_id": string, "chunk_count": number}.
Index MES corpus documents into org-scoped embeddings for semantic search. Return JSON {"indexed": number}.

Execute the LearnPlay regression checklist (CTA clicks, guard job, accessibility). Return JSON {"total_tests": number, "passed": number, "failed": number, "details": [{"name": string, "status": string, "notes": string}]}.
Export the standards mapping {{mapping_id}} to CSV and return JSON {"export_path": string}.
Ingest the uploaded standards document at {{storage_path}} and parse it into standards items. Return JSON {"standards_document_id": string, "item_count": number}.
Map the ingested material {{material_id}} to the standards document {{standards_document_id}} using embeddings. Return JSON {"mapping_id": string, "matches": number}.
